statements: SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE enrollment_date <= '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students ORDER BY student_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_name = 'Alice';
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students WHERE enrollment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id BETWEEN 1001 AND 2000 ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT student_id, student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_name LIKE '%John%' AND enrollment_date < '2022-03-01';
SELECT * FROM Student WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name FROM Student WHERE last_name = 'Smith';
SELECT * FROM Class WHERE class_id = 3;
SELECT class_name, class_schedule FROM Class WHERE class_instructor = 'John Doe';
SELECT * FROM Student ORDER BY last_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM Student WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT first_name, last_name, email FROM Student WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM Student ORDER BY last_name ASC, first_name ASC;
SELECT class_name, class_instructor, class_schedule FROM Class WHERE class_instructor = 'John Doe';
SELECT student_id, first_name, last_name, email FROM Student WHERE student_id > 3 ORDER BY student_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM student_enrollment;
SELECT student_id, course_id FROM student_enrollment WHERE enrollment_date = '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM class_schedules ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT course_id, schedule_id, start_time, end_time FROM class_schedules WHERE course_id = 101 ORDER BY schedule_id;
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade FROM grades WHERE grade >= 90;
SELECT student_id, course_id, enrollment_date FROM student_enrollment WHERE student_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM student_enrollment WHERE enrollment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_id, course_id, grade FROM student_enrollment JOIN grades ON student_enrollment.student_id = grades.student_id AND student_enrollment.course_id = grades.course_id;
SELECT course_id, schedule_id, start_time, end_time FROM class_schedules ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT AVG(grade) AS average_grade, course_id FROM grades GROUP BY course_id;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT student_name, student_age FROM Students;
SELECT class_name, class_schedule FROM Classes;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM Students WHERE student_age > 20;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM Students JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id;
SELECT student_name, student_age, student_email FROM Students
SELECT class_name, class_schedule FROM Classes ORDER BY class_name ASC
SELECT student_name, student_age, student_email, grade FROM Students INNER JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id WHERE grade = 'A'
SELECT class_name, COUNT(*) AS total_students FROM Classes JOIN Enrollment ON Classes.class_id = Enrollment.class_id GROUP BY class_name HAVING total_students > 5

SELECT student_name, class_name, grade FROM Students INNER JOIN Grades ON Students.student_id = Grades.student_id INNER JOIN Classes ON Grades.class_id = Classes.class_id WHERE grade = 'B' ORDER BY student_name ASC
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT class_name, class_description FROM classes ORDER BY class_name DESC;
SELECT student_name, class_name, grade FROM students s JOIN enrollments e ON s.student_id = e.student_id JOIN classes c ON e.class_id = c.class_id;
SELECT instructor_name, COUNT(instructor_id) AS total_classes FROM instructors GROUP BY instructor_name ORDER BY total_classes DESC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_name = 'John Doe';
SELECT student_name, student_email FROM students WHERE student_id = 3;
SELECT class_name, class_description FROM classes WHERE class_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM enrollments WHERE enrollment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_name, grade FROM students JOIN enrollments ON students.student_id = enrollments.student_id WHERE enrollments.grade >= 90;
